1411940.name: Silence in the Dark
1411940.description: Jon Morgan mid 30s ex-cop now private detective. Stumbles on one of a kind case that turns his world around. After finding a book in one of main suspects room. He brings the book home and tries to figure out what is going on.  The game begins in a abandoned town called "Lamias Wake". And you as a player have no memory how or when did you came here. Solve puzzles, survive, hunt or be hunted. Answer answers that left unanswered.
1411940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
